THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail directly supports the video's title: both focus on how to get pregnant using Pre-Seed. The reassuring, hopeful expression of the subject creates emotional engagement aligned with the 'TTC tips' aspect in the title.
